text-layer-input.text: the text that you want to display

placement.x: in %, the position on x-axis default to 0
placement.y: in %, the position on y axis default to 0

operations.color: color of the text default to black
operations.fontSize: font size of the text, default to 22px

frame-layer-input.path: url of the image that you want to use

placement.x: in %, the position on x-axis example inputs: 50, 60, 100
placement.y: in %, the position on y axis
placement.width: in % and px, width of the image
placement.height: in % and px, height of the image

operations.bgColor: background color for the frame layer
